Title: The Vows
Writer: Marta Kauffman (created by), Howard J. Morris (created by), Marta Kauffman, Howard J. Morris, Alexa Junge
Actors: Jane Fonda, Lily Tomlin, Sam Waterston, Martin Sheen
Plot: As the wedding day approaches, Grace and Robert have problems expressing themselves, while Sol and Frankie finally clear out their old house.
